articles.content:
S. Korean army stages military drill 
    Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- A unit under the first field army command of South Korea recently had an large-scale firing drill, according to a report.
 This three-day exercise was staged under the simulated conditions of the operation to "locate various objects in the depth of the enemy such as radar and electronic war equipment" and "find out the enemy by means of detection and strike it with artillery fire of the unit."
